title: Cynthia McKinney
content:
Doing the right thing is costly. McKinney twice lost her congressional seat for supporting Palestinian rights, socially progressive policies and peace.
In 2008, she was the Green Party presidential candidate.
Imagine America with her at the helm with a supportive Congress.
Instead of permanent wars and homeland repression, we’d have model society peace, equity and justice.
McKinney edited and contributed to a new book titled, “The Illegal War on Libya.
” It’s a must read to understand why Washington planned and led NATO’s war.
Discussion will focus on the book.
